name: True Balance
overview:
Constant change challenges the agility and flexibility of every business. The lack of timely, accurate information contributes to poorly informed decision making, which leads to future blind spots. True Balance provides fast, comprehensive, unfiltered feedback and input from all stakeholders, enabling the best outcomes.

Surprises are rarely appreciated. Events such as negative earnings, decline in growth, loss of key customer or key talent, new competitors in the marketplace, executive misbehavior, in most cases, arrive in the form of surprises. These kinds of surprises often have significant consequences â€“ CEO turnover, stock price crash, credit rating downgrade or loss of market share. Leaders who recognize their blind spots and make timely tactical and strategic adjustments will avoid surprises.

True Balance provides a comprehensive strategy management software to:

  • conduct rapid and early detection of operational blind spots;
  • get the unfiltered reality of the organization and the undercurrents that permeate the organization;
  • analyze the root cause behind those blind spots; and
  • facilitate creation and management of action plans that achieve high impact business outcomes.
